timeline.message: CB-5197 moved test blueprints under test folder so classpath will be available for main/resources. Added instance type validation for all cluster templates

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I think this is a leftover from the previous format of the instance type which was the following:
      disabled.instance.types: >
                              a1,
                              cr1,cc2,c3,c5d,c5n,c5.x,c5.24x,c1,c4,c5.m,c5.l,c5.12,c5.18,
                              d2,
                              f1,
                              g2,g3,
                              hs1,h1.16,
                              i3en,i3.l,i3.m,i3.x,i3.16,i2,
                              m1,m2,m3,m5d,m5ad,m4,m5a,m5.x,m5.m,m5.l,m5.12,m5.16,m5.24,
                              p3dn,p2.x,p3.16,
                              r3,r4,r5d.l,r5d.m,r5d.x,r5d.2x,r5d.12,r5d.24,r5d.8,r5d.16,r5a,r5.l,r5.x,r5.m,r5.24,r5.12,r5.16,
                              t1,t2,t3,
                              x1,
                              z1d

It was an array where every line contained multiple entries, that's why you needed the split. Now there is only one entry in each line. I only noticed the additional whitespaces in the unit tests and was annoyed by it.
replies.author: lnardai

replies.bodyText: Thanks I did not notify the double $ mark at first. Corrected that as well.
